import './profileUpdate.css'; import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Navigate , useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import {fetchUser} from '../../redux/action/authAction' import U_CONTROLLER from '../../Controllers/User.Controller'; function Profile(){ const[userData , setUserData] = useState(null); useEffect(()=> { const token = sessionStorage.getItem('token') async function getUser() { const userdata =await fetchUser(token); console.log("asasas" , userdata); setUserData(userdata.data) } getUser(); console.log("uD" , userData); }, []) const onDelete = async () => { const data = { id: userData?._id, name: userData?.email, } const result = await U_CONTROLLER.deleteUser(data); if(result == 200){ // return ; } console.log(result); } let navigate = useNavigate(); const editPage = () =>{ let path = `/editProfile/` + userData?._id; navigate(path); } return (
email
{userData?.email}
Profile Update
) } export default Profile
